SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class StudentManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentManagementController
public class StudentManagementController extends Object
Controller for managing students in the HKUST Examination System. Provides functionality for adding, deleting, updating, filtering, and managing student data. Includes integration with the database to ensure persistent storage and validation mechanisms.

      public StudentManagementController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the Student Management Controller. Sets up the database connections, loads student data, configures the TableView, and establishes event listeners.

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Deletes a student and their associated grades from the database. Displays a confirmation dialog before performing the deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the "Delete" button.

    • filterStudent

      public void filterStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Filters the students displayed in the TableView based on input criteria.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the "Filter" button.

    • refreshStudent

      public void refreshStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Refreshes the student table by clearing all filters and reloading the data.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the "Refresh" button.

    • resetFilter

      public void resetFilter(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Resets all filters applied to the student table.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the "Reset Filter" button.

    • updateStudent

      public boolean updateStudent(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Updates an existing student's data in the database. Displays a confirmation dialog for detected changes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the "Update" button.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • updateStudentInDatabase

      public void updateStudentInDatabase(Student student)
      Updates the selected student's information in the database. Displays a message upon successful update or if an error occurs.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object with updated information.

    • deleteStudentAndGradesFromDatabase

      public void deleteStudentAndGradesFromDatabase(Student student)
      Deletes a selected student and their associated grades from the database. Displays a message upon successful deletion or if an error occurs.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object to delete.

    • validateUpdateInput

      public boolean validateUpdateInput(Student student, List<String> changes)
      Validates the input fields for updating a student. Ensures all required fields are filled, and changes are detected for the selected student.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object to validate against.
      changes - A list to record detected changes in student information.
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateAddInput

      public boolean validateAddInput()
      Validates the input fields for adding a new student. Ensures that all fields are filled and contain valid data.
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateDepartment

      public boolean validateDepartment(String department)
      Validates the department input against a predefined list of valid departments.
      Parameters:
      department - The department input to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the department is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateUsername

      public boolean validateUsername(String username)
      Validates the username input for uniqueness and format. Ensures the username is alphanumeric and does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      username - The username input to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the username is valid, false otherwise.

    • validateAge

      public boolean validateAge(String age)
      Validates the age input for numeric format and range.
      Parameters:
      age - The age input to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the age is valid, false otherwise.

    • addStudentToDatabase

      public void addStudentToDatabase()
      Adds a new student to the database using the input fields. Displays a message upon successful addition or if an error occurs.

    • clearFields

      public void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields in the student management form.

    • noFilter

      public boolean noFilter()
      Checks if no filters are currently applied to the student table.
      Returns:
      true if no filters are applied, false otherwise.

    • loadStudentTable

      public List<Student> loadStudentTable()
      Loads student data into the TableView. If filters are applied, displays filtered results; otherwise, displays all students.
      Returns:
      A list of filtered students if filters are applied, or an empty list otherwise
